official_title: To grant certain authorities to the Secretary of the Treasury with respect to the seizure of assets in the United States that are owned or controlled by the Government of Iraq.

summary.as: Reported to House amended, Part I
summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Treasury to provide for the operation and management of any entity engaged in interstate commerce and located in the United States that is owned or controlled by the Iraqi Government and is blocked pursuant to executive orders blocking Iraqi assets if such entity produces goods or services important to U.S. interests.

titles.title: To grant certain authorities to the Secretary of the Treasury with respect to the seizure of assets in the United States that are owned or controlled by the Government of Iraq.
